name: data-synthesizer-basic
description: Highly configurable tool that will dynamically generate data. The data is created in realtime, and is a completely client-side service; no server side is needed.

scripts.compile: tsc --declaration --removeComments true --outDir dist --target ES6 --moduleResolution node lib/data-synthesizer-basic.service.ts lib/data-synth-util.ts

author: Todd M. Eischeid
